attributes.action: Make Nicola Sturgeon Queen of the United Kingdom and Northern Ireland
attributes.additional_details: Nicola Sturgeon is the best person in the whole United Kingdom and Northern Ireland and deserves to be Queen of it
attributes.background: Nicola Sturgeon is the best person in the whole United Kingdom and Northern Ireland and deserves to be Queen of it

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions about honours or appointments, which includes calling for Nicola Sturgeon to be made the Queen of Great Britain and Northern Ireland.
